com.extrahop.tools.rest

Class RestClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.extrahop.tools.rest.RestClient

  • public class RestClient
extends java.lang.Object
    RestClient is a Java wrapper for the ExtraHop REST API.
    Author:
    jeffbfry

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RestClient(java.lang.String host, java.lang.String apiKey)
      Construct the RestClient with the host and API key.

        public Device[] getDevices(int lastNHours)
                    throws RestException

        Parameters:
        lastNHours - Specifies the period to query active devices.

                                              throws RestException

        Parameters:
